verses.roman:
sei bhāva, sei kṛṣṇa, sei vṛndāvana
yabe pāi, tabe haya vāñchita pūraṇa

synonyms: sei bhāva—that circumstance; sei kṛṣṇa—that Kṛṣṇa; sei vṛndāvana—that Vṛndāvana; yabe pāi—if I get; tabe—then; haya—is; vāñchita—desired object; pūraṇa—fulfilled.
translation: Thus meeting with Kṛṣṇa and thinking of the Vṛndāvana atmosphere, Rādhārāṇī longed for Kṛṣṇa to take Her to Vṛndāvana again to fulfill Her desire in that calm atmosphere.
